version_description: · Added Apple Watch support
· Bug fixes and performance improvements

· Fixed English strings, huge thanks to Derek Pollard from Envoza Ltd. Go and check his amazing Inkpad vector editor for iPad.
· Reduced amount of steps in the Welcome Screen.
· Added anchor created date to the compass screen.
· Bug fixes and performance improvements
· Added localization for Chinese, German (beta), Japanese, Spanish, Czech
· The app icon is changed to dark. You can select its color by your own in the app Settings > App Icon menu.
· Bug fixes and perfomance improvements
· Added French localization
· Bug fixes and perfomance improvements
· Bug fixes and perfomance improvements
· Bug fixes and perfomance improvements

· Small improvements
· Updated App Store icon
· Fixed alternative icon settings (Thank you Lee for letting me know)
· This update contains performance improvements and bug fixes to keep Anchor Pointer running smoothly.
· Added geocaching coordinates format. Open Settings > Coordinates Format.

· Added geocaching coordinates format. Open Settings > Coordinates Format.
· Icon selection bug is fixed.

· Anchor Pointer now has an optional tip jar (in the Settings). We've never charged for a new version so any additional support will be gratefully received. The tip jar is there as a way for you to show your appreciation and support for new updates. Thank you.
· This update contains performance improvements and bug fixes to keep Anchor Pointer running smoothly.

– Fixed Apple Watch synchronisation with iPhone
– Added ability to change units on Apple Watch
– Added ability to delete anchors on Apple Watch
– Added ability to sort anchors on Apple Watch
– Added ability to change coordinates format on Apple Watch
Fixed fonts and shadows for iOS dark appearance
– Added Chinese localization
• Synchronisation with Apple Watch is refined

• New app icon

You can change it back by opening app settings -> App Icon section.
